text.name: longdescription
text.text: Was released by Mattel Electronics competing with the Atari 2600. CPU GI CP1610 524B RAM, 932B graph. RAM, 7168B ROM, Sound GI AY-3-8914. Retail: NA: ’79–’80 UK: ’81 DE/FR/JP: ’82. Note: Better used with 2 gamepads or use Select button to swap controllers and Right on D-pad.
